# Adjustable Disguise (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Glamer Spells|glamer]])

**Level:** [[3rd Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 3]], [[3rd Level Antipaladin Spells|Antipaladin 3]], [[3rd Level Bard Spells|Bard 3]], [[3rd Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 3]], [[3rd Level Mesmerist Spells|Mesmerist 3]], [[3rd Level Occultist Spells|Occultist 3]], [[3rd Level Psychic Spells|Psychic 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Witch Spells|Witch 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 172

This spell functions as *[[Disguise Self (Spell)|disguise self]]*, except as a swift action you can alter the disguise (within the limitations of *[[Disguise Self (Spell)|disguise self]]*). For example, you could make yourself look like a young human city guard, then an old elven wizard of the opposite gender, then a halfling thief, and so on. You can change the disguise a number of times equal to your caster level.

**GM Note**

Added Mesmerist 3, Occultist 3, Psychic 3 to Level.
